javadoc:
Property manager that deals with properties that are of
 String type.

methods.name: add
methods.comment: Add a String value at the specified address.

methods.name: getString
methods.comment: Get the String value at the given address.

params.name: addr
params.comment: the address from where to get the String value

return.comment: String or null if property not found at addr.

name: StringPropertyMap
comment:
Property manager that deals with properties that are of
 String type.
